# Nature's Favor (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Animal touched

**Duration:** 1 minute

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 146

*Rubbing the animal’s side, you whisper the final bit of the spell’s ritual. The animal glances at you before turning its attention to your foes, bristling as it does so.*

You grant the subject animal a +1 luck bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls for every three caster levels you possess (maximum +5).
